divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside and saw a super bright object in the sky. It was not moving, and pretty far away. The video was taken with a Canon L2 Pro Camcorder (HI-8) with a 15 x zoom lens. I don't know what it was. It seemed to glow with every color in the rainbow. Pause the screen, and you will know what I am talking about. I recently got this camera, so I am not good with it yet. (lots of buttons, etc). It disappeared as the sun was coming up. So I think it was a star. Although there were several stars in the horizon, this one was something that gave off a great amount of brilliance. Can someone tell me what it may be? thanks
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around August 22nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
